price: E, quando leres o Alcorão, suplica a proteção de Allah contra o maldito Satã.
arabic: فَإِذَا قَرَأۡتَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ فَٱسۡتَعِذۡ بِٱللَّهِ مِنَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِ ٱلرَّجِيمِ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā qarata al-qur'āna fa-is'taʿidh bil-lahi mina al-shayṭāni al-rajīmi
